content: Internship at JMD web studio Worked in Node.js, Socket.io, React.js, Java. Built chat system, user report and admin dashboard. We have deployed multiple apps in playstore. Some of them has web version as well. I was a backend software engineer intern there. This is an app I actively worked on. Freelancing (Truelancer) Worked on couple of projects in Django, react native. Mainly adding features and fixing bugs. [proifile link] NASA Spaceapps 2021 Hackathon We developed LuCon, a software to communicate with the astronauts on the moon and the base station. [project link]
